attributes.action: immediately ban the sale of halal meat from any store, shop, warehouse inside the coastal boundaries of the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Halal meat is a vile abomination of abuse of animals and would not be countenanced if it were practised by christians.  It should, therefore, not be countenanced because it is practised by Muslims.  Halal meat should NOT be allowed to be sold anywhere in the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
